contents.company: Volunteer Coordination Office, Aristotle University of Thessaloniki
IT Center of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

info.text: Preparing the upgrade of the teleconferencing service "Big Blue Button", which the university uses, from Flash technology to HTML5; the project started in 2017 and was completed in 2020
Requirements document preparation for audiovisual equipment (cameras, microphones etc.) procurement
Audiovisual conference support and video editing for conference sharing through internet
